title: FS:  Bobby Byrne T215 Red Cross Tobacco Type 1
author: Edwolf1963

posts.post_title: FS:  Bobby Byrne T215 Red Cross Tobacco Type 1
posts.post_content: FS:  T215 Red Cross Tobacco Type 1, Bobby Byrne PSA4.  Scans tell the story - absolutely beautiful card, centering, color, no creases or flaws.  Looks under-graded, solid cross-over candidate.  **Moved to eBay**
